item.name: patient MS
get specific patient info by patient id
create patient
inventory MS
get all medicines info in inventory MS
get specific medicine info by medicine name
update medicine inventory by medicine name
prescription MS
get prescriptions by status

response.name: sample response
response.body:
{
    "code": 200,
    "data": {
        "prescriptions": [
            {
                "description": "Runny nose, sore throat",
                "doctor_id": 1,
                "id": 1,
                "medicines": "{\"Cymbalta\":1, \"Omeprazole\":2, \"Fentanyl\":1}",
                "patient_id": "t1234567a",
                "sendToPayment": "yes",
                "status": "pending"
            },
            {
                "description": "Covid",
                "doctor_id": 2,
                "id": 2,
                "medicines": "{\"Ibuprofen\":2}",
                "patient_id": "t1234568a",
                "sendToPayment": "yes",
                "status": "pending"
            },
            {
                "description": "Fever",
                "doctor_id": 6,
                "id": 4,
                "medicines": "{\"Xanax\":1, \"Azithromycin\":1}",
                "patient_id": "t1234570a",
                "sendToPayment": "no",
                "status": "pending"
            },
            {
                "description": "Runny nose, sore throat",
                "doctor_id": 3,
                "id": 6,
                "medicines": "{\"Citalopram\":1}",
                "patient_id": "t1234572a",
                "sendToPayment": "no",
                "status": "pending"
            },
            {
                "description": "Flu",
                "doctor_id": 2,
                "id": 7,
                "medicines": "{\"Imbruvica\":2, \"Gabapentin\":1}",
                "patient_id": "t1234573a",
                "sendToPayment": "no",
                "status": "pending"
            },
            {
                "description": "Flu",
                "doctor_id": 4,
                "id": 10,
                "medicines": "{\"Amitriptyline\":3}",
                "patient_id": "t1234576a",
                "sendToPayment": "no",
                "status": "pending"
            },
            {
                "description": "Stomach flu",
                "doctor_id": 6,
                "id": 17,
                "medicines": "{\"Adderall\":4}",
                "patient_id": "t1234569a",
                "sendToPayment": "no",
                "status": "pending"
            }
        ]
    }
}
